ygData.subject: Re: Blackburrow - 3 levels in one night!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can benefit from elites/commanders up to level 17.  But, the experience is very little - although you can actually solo them (good dual wield
ygData.messageBody:
>My conclusion: Why would anyone go to BB after 16, when there's
>little xp to be had, but trains that can waste a 30?

You can benefit from elites/commanders up to level 17. But,
the experience is very little - although you can actually
solo them (good dual wield practice).

The trains in there are pretty bad, but it has to be some
train to kill a level 30. I admit at level 25 or so, I
was killed in BB by 3 elites and 1 commander simulatenously.
(I dropped one commander and 2 elites, the third elite
killed me) - but I saved the poor chap under attack.

At level 30, you can roll in there and bust up the place.
DDD and Screech and Lullaby save the day.

Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
